p: Moreover, for specific categories of medicinal products within the NBCDs group, our recommendations are linked to a thorough characterization of quality and of the quality attributes ( 34). They are key for the biodisposition and for the biological activity, efficacy, and safety. Additionally, sound and validated analytical tools for quality characterization should be made available.
